name: Artivion, Inc.
description: Artivion, Inc. is a leading medical technology company specializing in innovative solutions for the treatment of cardiovascular diseases. Founded in 1992, the company is headquartered in Kennesaw, Georgia, and has established itself as a pioneer in the field of heart valve replacement and repair technologies. Artivion's flagship products include its advanced tissue heart valves and surgical solutions designed to restore normal blood flow and improve patient outcomes. The company focuses on developing biologic and synthetic solutions to meet the diverse needs of patients and healthcare professionals. With a commitment to research and development, Artivion continually strives to enhance its portfolio through innovative technologies and partnerships. The company’s mission is to transform the treatment of cardiovascular conditions by providing cutting-edge medical devices that improve quality of life for patients around the globe. Artivion is dedicated to advancing the field of cardiac surgery and fostering a culture of excellence and integrity in all its operations.
